_comment: Training Readiness Monitor Configuration - Edit these values to customize the app text and branding

branding.title: Training Readiness Survey
branding.subtitle: Based on the Hooper Index Assessment

instructions._comment: Instructions shown to users when filling out the assessment
instructions.assessmentDescription: Rate each factor on waking this morning (1 = very good/low, 5 = very poor/high)

buttons.saveHelpText: Saves to Recent History (resets on page refresh)

metrics._comment: Labels for the four Hooper Index metrics

recommendations._comment: Training recommendations shown based on readiness level

high.focus: Skill work, high-intensity intervals, strength training

moderate.intensity: Moderate intensity, peak efforts may not appropriate
moderate.volume: Consider reducing volume (ex: work to lower end of the set/rep range)

low.focus: Active recovery, mobility, light skill work or a rest day
low.recovery: Priority on sleep, nutrition, stress management
